summary: Adds books with information you can use.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a few new books to the world of Skyrim:

Alchemist\'s Desk Reference
The Masks of Power
Forgemaster\'s Catalog (Heavy)
Forgemaster\'s Catalog (Light)
Jeweler\'s Handbook

Thank you to everyone for your suggestions! They help this little mod improve. Let me know if there are any errors or omissions; I will fix them with an update.


=== Version 0.1 ===
- Initial release
- \"Alchemist\'s Desk Reference\"
- \"The Masks of Power\"
- Custom item lists for merchants
- Custom containers
- Added another chest to Skyhaven armory
- A certain draugr boss drops extra stuff (see spoilers)
===================

=== Version 0.2 ===
- All books now have 1 weight
- Price changes
- added \"Forgemaster\'s Catalog (Heavy)\"
- added \"Forgemaster\'s Catalog (Light)\"
- added \"Forgemaster\'s Catalog (Heavy)\", special edition for Eorlund Gray-Mane...
- added \"Jeweler\'s Handbook\"
- Brand new *leveled* lists added to select merchants throughout the lands
- Updated hints section below
===================
author: anotherborf
